/* com.innobiz.orange.web.wh.dao.WhMdPichLDao.selectWhMdPichL */
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.MD_ID, T.PICH_TYP_CD, T.ID_VA, T.SORT_ORDR, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (CASE WHEN T.PICH_TYP_CD = 'O' THEN (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_ORG_B WHERE ORG_ID = T.ID_VA) ELSE (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.ID_VA) END) AND LANG_TYP_CD = 'ko') AS PICH_NM
FROM WH_MD_PICH_L T
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.SORT_ORDR ASC
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
